page.title: 13LIFE IN ST.PETER
page.content: It is not very quiet and peaceful around my house. We have a lot of farms round our way. I live by a farm with my Mum, Dad and two brothers called Peter and Christopher. Peter has got a television, a clock radio and a computer. I have a clock radio and a Walkman cassette player. Christopher is only three and three-quarter years old. He has a lot of cuddly toys. Like a lot of houses we have a cooker, television, freezer, washing machine, drier and fridge. It is not very quiet around our house because we live near the Airport. In the field at the back there is a row of lights to help the planes land. There are a lot of cows grazing by our house and farmers grow potatoes, cauliflowers, cucumbers and peppers. {by Tara Le Marinel
